column3: @sipa Thanks for reviewing! Feedback addressed. Please re-review :-)

@eklitzke No I haven't tried `iwyu` yet. These violations were found using my `lint-includes.sh` script which has been submitted as PR #11878 :-)\n\nWhen this PR is merged I can try `iwyu` and see if it finds something worth fixing :-)

> When this PR is merged I can try iwyu and see if it finds something worth fixing :-)\n\nI sometimes use IWYU. I posted steps to run it with bitcoin at https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/11878#issuecomment-351610027
`utilstrencodings.h` seems to be included in `rpc/util.h` for no reason. Maybe it's better to remove it there?
